name: Home Slice Pizza
description: Home Slice Pizza is an independent neighborhood pizza joint serving authentic NY-style pizza- by the pie or by the slice- to nice people like you. We offer our homemade, hand-tossed, bona fide pies for either dine-in or carryout.

name: Joe's Coffee
description: Stumptown coffee, baked goods & sandwiches in colorful digs with outdoor area for people-watching
